document.forum_title: Latest Asia-Pacific News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Pro-independence activists stage protest at airport as mainland official visits Taiwan
document.topic_text: Pro-independence activists stage protest at airport as mainland official visits Taiwan Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 9 minutes ago ) Taiwanese shouting anti-communist slogans staged an airport protest on Monday against a visit by a top Shanghai official which they see as intended to promote China’s unification with Taiwan.
document.post: Pro-independence activists stage protest at airport as mainland official visits Taiwan Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 9 minutes ago ) Taiwanese shouting anti-communist slogans staged an airport protest on Monday against a visit by a top Shanghai official which they see as intended to promote China’s unification with Taiwan.
